mdRecord.dcterms:title: Japanese Mission visiting Mount Vernon, August 26, 1917
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Washington, D.C. : Press of Judd & Detweiler, Inc., 1918
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Published image of the Japanese Mission visit to Mount Vernon. Taken from "Addresses at the Tomb of Washington by the Special Missions from France, England, Italy, Russia, Belgium, Japan, Serbia, 1917-1918," by Josephus Daniels. Amongst the group are Viscount Ishii, Ambassador Sato, Vice Admiral Tateshita, and other members of the Japanese Mission. U. S. Officials, Secretary Josephus Daniels, Secretary Lansing, and Mr. Roland S. Morris, U. S. Ambassador to Japan.
